footer.description: VinciCore is a technology company that provides innovative solutions for your business.

about.heroDescription: Discover the history, values and vision that drive VinciCore in its mission to support your digital transformation.

companyStory.title: Our History
companyStory.description1: VinciCore was born from a passion for technology and a desire to create digital solutions that truly transform businesses.
companyStory.description2: Founded with the conviction that every organization deserves technological tools that match its ambitions.
companyStory.description3: Since our beginnings, we have specialized in supporting companies of all sizes in their digital transformation, combining cutting-edge technical expertise and a human-centered approach focused on your real needs.
companyStory.missionDescription: Democratize access to cutting-edge technologies by making advanced digital solutions accessible to all businesses, regardless of their size.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The fundamental principles that guide our action and define our unique approach to customer service.
values.innovationDescription: We stay at the forefront of technology to offer you innovative and efficient solutions.
values.reliabilityDescription: Our commitment to quality and reliability makes us a trusted partner for the long term.
values.proximityDescription: We prioritize a close relationship and personalized support for each client.

stats.title: VinciCore in Numbers
stats.description: Some data that testify to our commitment and expertise

founder.title: Meet the Founder
founder.description: Marwen Helali, founder and CEO of VinciCore, is a technology expert with more than 10 years of experience in developing innovative digital solutions.

vision.title: Our Vision for the Future
vision.description: To be the leading technology partner that supports companies in their digital transformation, creating solutions that make a difference and generate real value.

contact.heroDescription: Do you have a project in mind? A question about our services? Our team is here to support you and answer all your needs.
contact.formDescription: Fill out the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Describe your project or your question...
contact.successMessage: Message sent successfully! We will respond to you soon.
contact.contactInfoDescription: We are available to answer all your questions and discuss your projects. Do not hesitate to contact us!
contact.additionalInfoDescription: Each project is unique. Contact us for a personalized consultation and let's discover together how VinciCore can support you in your success.

home.heroDescription: VinciCore supports you in your digital transformation with innovative and personalized solutions to propel your company into the future.
home.ourExpertiseDescription: Complete solutions to support your growth and digital transformation
home.feature1Description: Software solutions adapted to your specific needs
home.feature2Description: Migration and optimization of your infrastructures
home.feature3Description: Complete protection of your data and systems
home.whyChooseUsDescription: Our innovation and quality-centered approach allows us to deliver solutions that exceed your expectations.
home.innovationPerformanceDescription: We combine the latest technologies with a pragmatic approach to create solutions that propel your business to success.
home.ctaDescription: Let's discuss your projects and discover together how VinciCore can support you in your success.
